title: Snuffed: Part One
description: WARNING: This book is not just dark - it’s horrific, depraved and disturbing. If you do not enjoy books containing blood, guts, taboo and more – this book is not for you.  Death would have been simple. I don't have that option anymore. In order to survive him, I must be what he craves.  *The SNUFF sequel will be published in two parts. This is part one, and part two will be releasing Fall 2016.
author: Bonny Capps
